description: Comprehensive Miller toolkit review session: (1) Added tags parameter to recall for filtering by checkpoint tags; (2) Documented kind_filter valid values (Call, Import, Reference, Extends, Implements); (3) Standardized parameter naming to 'workspace' everywhere; (4) Documented fast_goto as intentionally hidden; (5) Refined tool docstring tone using behavioral-adoption patterns - Layer 1-3 (instructions.md) keeps emotional urgency, Layer 4 (tool docstrings) uses directive language (ALWAYS/REQUIRED) with confidence building ('trust results', 'no need to verify'). All 747 tests pass.
